com.teaminternational.coe.tests

Class BaseWebDriverTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teaminternational.coe.tests.BaseWebDriverTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseCustomTest

    public class BaseWebDriverTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic test class. Use it as parent for all your testing classes. Contains setup and tear down methods for test, initiation, loading of basic configuration. Define basic Allure reporting before and after each method execution. Enable integration with Zephyr for JIRA Cloud API Add 2 TestNG based listeners and 2 Selenide listeners to the basic test class
    Version:
    1.0 01/10/18
    Author:
    Vladyslav.Yegorov@teaminternational.com
    See Also:
    TestMethodListener, TestListener, SoftAsserts, TextReport

    • Method Detail

      • beforeSuite

        @BeforeSuite
public void beforeSuite(org.testng.ITestContext ctx)
        Method executed before test run. Load base configuration and save into PropertiesContext singleton. Setup Selenide Configuration. Write log about starting test run.
        Parameters:
        ctx - test context with information about test run

      • beforeMethod

        @BeforeMethod
public void beforeMethod(org.testng.ITestContext testContext)
        Method executed before test method execution. initialize logger, properties context, common helper and homepage. Write log in case of error of initialization.
        Parameters:
        testContext - test context with information about test run

      • afterMethod

        @AfterMethod
public void afterMethod(org.testng.ITestContext testContext,
                                      org.testng.ITestResult result)
        Method executed after test method execution. Assert test method execution. Verify on Javascript errors in webdriver logs, in closing webdriver and in saving report logs.
        Parameters:
        testContext - test context with information about test run
        result - Test method result

      • afterSuite

        @AfterSuite
public void afterSuite(org.testng.ITestContext ctx)
        Method executed after test run execution. Tries to close webdriver and write report log in case of error.
        Parameters:
        ctx - test context with information about test run
